casebody.data:
Deutsche Bank National Trust Company, as Trustee for Registered Holders of Ameriquest Mortgage Securities, Inc., Asset-Backed Pass Through Certificates, Series 2005-R2
v.
Michael S. Gardner 13 NO. 699 EAL 2015 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania May 03, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Reconsideration Denied June 16, 2016.

Disposition: Denied.
